Title: Ekiti 2026: PDP begins mobilisation, vows to win governorship election
Summary: The leadership of the Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) in Ekiti has begun mobilisation of members . It resolved to commit itself to the survival and success of the party in the 2026 governorship election in the state .

Title: Anambra 2025: APC gov candidate pledges inclusive community development
Summary: Prince Nicholas Ukachukwu has assured the 179 communities in the state that his administration would give them special consideration in all affairs . The All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate for the Anambra State Governorship election has pledged inclusive community development .

Title: PRP Rep defects to APC, cites Tinubu’s economic reforms
Summary: Honourable Muhammad Adam Alkali is a former lawmaker representing Bassa/Jos North Federal Constituency, Honourable . Muhammad Adam . Alkala . The former PRP Rep defects to APC, cites Tinubu's economic reforms .

Title: Tinubu reschedules Kaduna trip, to visit Benue Wednesday
Summary: President Bola Ahmed Tinubu will visit Benue State on Wednesday in an attempt to address the conflict plaguing communities in the state, which has claimed many lives . This was announced in a press statement released by the Special Adviser to the President .

Title: Stop turning a blind eye as Benue drowns in blood, Atiku tells Tinubu, Alia
Summary: Former Vice President Atiku Abubakar tells President Bola Tinubu and Benue State Governor Hyacinth Alia to stop turning a blind eye to the killings happening in Benue . In the past two days, over 200 people have been killed .

Title: Investigate Osun govt move to incite fresh violence – APC
Summary: The All Progressives Congress, APC, in Osun State, have tasked the State Commissioner of Police, Umar Abba, to probe a plot by members of the Governor Ademola Adeleke-led administration to incite fresh violence . This is as the PDP described the APC as a party that has been described

Title: Okpebholo recalls suspended EPHDA Executive Secretary
Summary: Governor Monday Okpebholo has recalled Dr. Coulsdon Oahimire as Executive Secretary of Edo Primary Health Development Agency (EPHDA) Oahuimire was suspended about seven weeks ago following a petition of alleged misappropriation of funds meant for UNICEF and other partners’ immunisation programme and

Title: Bricklayer bags life imprisonment for defiling minor in toilet
Summary: Azeez Shoderu was sentenced to life imprisonment for defiling his neighbour’s eight-year-old daughter in a toilet . An Ikeja Sexual Offences and Domestic Violence Court on Monday sentenced a Bricklayer to life .

Title: Why oil companies are leaving Nigeria – PENGASSAN
Summary: The Petroleum and Natural Gas Senior Staff Association of Nigeria, PENGASSAN, raised the alarm on Monday . It said worsening insecurity in Nigeria’s oil-producing areas, especially in the waterways, is forcing multinational oil companies to divest from the country .

Title: Benue Massacre: Labour Party demands probe, deployment of additional troops
Summary: Labour Party demands a comprehensive probe, arrest and prosecution of those behind the senseless killings in Benue State . It also called for security reinforcements to vulnerable communities across the north central . Acting National Chairman of the party, Senator Nenadi Usman, made these demands .

Title: NDDC reaffirms commitment to gender equality, women's empowerment
Summary: The Niger Delta Development Commission, has reaffirmed its commitment to gender equality and women’s empowerment in the Niger Delta region . The NDDC Executive Director of Projects, Victor Antai, said the Commission was taking significant steps toward promoting inclusivity and development for women across the region .

Title: RCCG worshippers escape building collapse in Lagos
Summary: The collapse of a two-storey building under construction was at Craig street off Apata Road in the Shomolu area of Lagos State . The collapse affected a nearby church, the Redeemed Christian Church of God Liberty Parish located at No. 5, Craig St., after concrete pillars from the collapsed building, fell onto

Title: Prolonged power outage cripples businesses in Katsina community
Summary: Residents of Malumfashi local government area of Katsina State have expressed deep frustration and concern over the prolonged power outage which has crippled economic activities in the area . The complaint is contained in a letter dated June 13, 2025, addressed to the Regional Manager, Kano Electricity Distribution Company, Katsina South Region, a copy of which

Title: 10-year-old boy accidentally shoots, kills police inspector father in Anambra
Summary: A 10-year-old boy has accidentally shot and killed his father, a Police Inspector, with the officer’s service AK-47 rifle . The boy was said to be fondling the rifle assigned to the police officer when he mistakenly pulled the trigger, and the bullet struck the officer on the back . It was gathered that

Title: NAFDAC warns Nigerians about unregistered antibiotic found in Lagos
Summary: The National Agency for Food and Drugs Administration and Control has alerted the public to the discovery of an unregistered batch of Tarivid 200mg in Nigeria . The product was discovered by officers from NAFDAC’s Post-Marketing Surveillance Directorate during a routine surveillance activity in the Onipanu area of Shomolu Local
